ing: 1 orange - peeled, quartered, and cut into 1/2 inch slices
des: "This drink is a great-tasting breakfast treat that only takes about 10 minutes to make. Why not try a breakfast drink with chocolate? Drink up and enjoy!"
ins: Combine orange pieces, chocolate syrup, milk, and ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a tall glass and enjoy.
